## Summary
A concise one-line summary of the feature.

## Problem or Use Case
Describe the problem or why this feature is valuable.

## Proposed Solution
Describe the recommended approach at a high level. Include files/components to edit if known and any dependencies or APIs required.

## Acceptance Criteria
List the criteria that must be satisfied before this issue is considered complete:
- [ ] Implement the feature
- [ ] Unit tests added
- [ ] Integration tests added (if applicable)
- [ ] Documentation updated

## Notes
- Any additional details, API keys, or environment variables required to test locally.
